contact-buttons.whatsapp-msg: Hello Dario! I would like to know more about your photography services.

portfolio.title: What  photography services you can hire ?

about-me.title: About me
about-me.subtitle: How are you? Let me tell you a bit about me
about-me.paragraph-1: For 10 years, I worked as a broadcaster and journalist in Córdoba, Argentina. During that time, I worked as a sports and entertainment columnist, radio mobiles, I was an information and content producer for different radio media, and I was also the creator and host of radio programs like "Recta final", "Córdoba Sport" y "Energía Deportiva".
about-me.paragraph-2: During that process, I began to get into the world  of sports photography.
about-me.paragraph-3: Another of my great passions is fashion. For this reason, I decided to train as an image consultant and personal shopper, with the purpose of merging photography and fashion. Later, I started my work at the fashion production company "Pandora Estudio", where I am currently working as a photographic producer.
about-me.paragraph-4: Also, I take photographs of concerts, fashion shows, events, product photos, photojournalism and personal books.

pandora-estudio.title: Pandora Estudio
pandora-estudio.desc: It is an audiovisual production company, focused on Professional Photography services and small videos to designers and emerging talents in the Fashion world. Art events and concerts are also covered.
pandora-estudio.quote: "We support local art with a divergent and inclusive vision."

pandora-beauty.title: Pandora Estudio
pandora-beauty.desc: Professional Makeup, Hairdressing and Fashion Styling Services. Realization of fashion productions.

footer.quote: "Seeing is not enough; you have to feel what you photograph." André Kertesz
